notes: Only black screen during cutscenes (audio/subtitles plays and you can skip cutscenes). Crashes on exit, have to manually terminate the game. Otherwise runs excellent. Logitech F710 gamepad works perfect. Disabling Steam overlay, Disable Esync & Use WineD3D have no effect, Disable D3D11 prevents the game from starting (even though the store page lists only DX9 required)
title: Party Hard 2
